lines.text: If Control's Control is Absolute, then why does Control need to Control?

The Leaders of this most insecure of all Worlds are Leaders by accident. Inept, frightened pilots at the controls of a vast machine they cannot understand. Calling in experts to tell them which buttons to push.
Is Control controlled by its need to Control?
Death needs Time like a junkie needs junk.
Death needs Time for what it kills to grow in, for Ah Pook's sweet sake you stupid, vulgar, greedy, Ugly-American Death Sucker!
Why does Control need "Humans", as you call them?
Weight, weight, time a landing-field. Death needs Time like a junkie needs junk.
